casebody.data:
FERREE v. MOQUIN-OFFERMAN-HEISSENBUTTEL COAL CO. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

May 22, 1899.) Action by Samuel P. Ferree against the Moquin-Offerman-Heissenbuttel Coal Company. Judgment affirmed. Cameron & Hill, for appellant. C. N. Judson, for respondent. MCCARTHY, P. j.

We have examined the record on appeal, and are satisfied that the trial justice properly directed a verdict herein. Judgment affirmed, with costs. CONLAN, J., concurs.
